summary: The 'Protecting Young Minds Online Act' (H.R. 5074) proposes an amendment to the Public Health Service Act. It directs the Center for Mental Health Services to develop and implement a strategy to help local communities address the effects of new technologies, such as social media, on children's mental health. This includes the creation and dissemination of a related strategy. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on August 29, 2025.
